external.gw.api.database.upgrade

Interface CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BeforeUpgradeVersionAction, BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger, IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>, VersionAction
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface CreateSpatialIndexVersionTrigger
extends BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger, IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>
    Version trigger to create a new spatial index with non-Guidewire default options

      • createSpatialIndex

        void createSpatialIndex(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String columnName,
                      java.lang.String ddl)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a spatial index with the given DDL. Can be called from the execute() method. For information about the DDL syntax and available options, please consult the documentation for your database: Oracle: http://docs.oracle.com/html/A88805_01/sdo_intr.htm#877657 Microsoft SQL Server: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb964712.aspx DB2:
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table with the spatial column
        columnName - Name of the column with the spatial datatype
        ddl - Full DDL to create the spatial index.

      • hasVersionCheck

        boolean hasVersionCheck()
        Deprecated. 
        Specified by:
        hasVersionCheck in interface BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger
        Returns:
        true if this version trigger has an associated version check. Please override createVersionCheck().
